function.name: mute_turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the mute function of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.

screenPosition.description: The predefined screen position of the SmartThings device that needs to be muted.
